name: part_004
file: tmp_≪DREAMCATCHER 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday Celebration 2024! #BaeDay2024 [TQSikoeVXoE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Super Affection' featuring Hakos Baelz, Ninomae Ina'nis, Ayunda Risu, and Natsuiro Matsuri.
Transition scene leading into the next song.
Performance of 'Internet Overdose' featuring Hakos Baelz, Mori Calliope, and IRyS.

subtitles.original: 君と一緒に　いがいちばん

subtitles.english: ...I'll pull you along

subtitles.english: ru-ranra! Don't be late
